name: Safan Catalog & Enquiry For WooCommerce
author: Md Rashed Hossain

sections.description:
Safan Catalog Enquiry is a robust WordPress plugin that can help you to convert woo commerce store into a catalog. You can show any digital and analog product without showing the price. There are lots of customization option will be there. Here are our some bold features”-

Include features

  • Hide price from shop page
  • Hide price from single product
  • Hide cart button from shop page
  • Hide cart button from single product
  • Add enquiry form on single product
  • You can use unlimited fields in enquiry form
  • You can use custom css
  • You can change button color & background color
  • Fully customizable
  • Compitable with Latest version
  • Full Responsive
  • Clean Design
  • Translation Ready

N.B: If you want more options in this plugin, please contact with us
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.9 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WP Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)
  • You need to install contact form 7

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Press the ‘Edit with Elementor’ button.
  5. Now you have the Elements Buddy from the left panel which yu can drag onto the content area.

Setup

  1. After install the plugin you must need to create one contact form
  2. You must have to keep on field and the field name will be (your-subject)
  3. Then you need to go WooCommerce setting page here you will find one tab “Catalog & Enquiry”. Here you will find all the options to configure the plugin.

Before installing this plugin, you must have to install “WooCommerce & Contact Form 7”
